channel.title: A lil help here,
channel.description:
A lil help here,.. my server will turn on but it says its not online, i have port = 43594 + i had this server for over 1 year now,.. so dont be posting stupid comments :]
~ its deltascape source..

item.title: A lil help here,
item.dc:creator: @legend-scape legend-scape
item.description:
@legend-scape wrote:

i cba uploading the pic, but when i put it online with the [run] it works fine, but wen i goto my client/silab client it says error connecting to server, + port = 43594

here is the code,

public void run() { // setup the listener try { shutdownClientHandler = false; clientListener = new java.net.ServerSocket(serverlistenerPort, 1, null); misc.println("Legend-Scape."); while (true) { try { java.net.Socket s = clientListener.accept(); s.setTcpNoDelay(true); String connectingHost = s.getInetAddress().getHostName(); if ( /* * connectingHost.startsWith("localhost") || * connectingHost.equals("127.0.0.1") */true) { if (connectingHost.contains("74-129-182-147.dhcp.insightbb.com")) { misc.println("Checking Server Status..."); s.close();

Read full topic

item.title: A lil help here,
item.dc:creator: @Gh0stb4rr4g3 Gh0stb4rr4g3
item.description:
@Gh0stb4rr4g3 wrote:

Okay go to server.java

Search for:


online

You should see something like this:

ublic void run() {
        // setup the listener
        try {
            shutdownClientHandler = false;
            clientListener = new java.net.ServerSocket(serverlistenerPort, 1,
                    null);
            misc.println("- Ghostscape -");
            misc.println(" ..  Online!");
            while (true) {
                java.net.Socket s = acceptSocketSafe(clientListener);

If you can’t find online , search your server name and change the text.

Ok that was a nub tut.

Jking , please explain why it wont work ? You click on run … And then ? What shows up ? Screen plox www.imageshack.us upload it there.

ok then here is the [run]

title ~~~~

thats its in the runserver.bat,
